Name: Toffee Apple Martini
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of apple slice & fudge.
Review: Brandy, gin and vodka-laced apple and rich caramel toffee.
Nutrition: One serving of Toffee Apple Martini contains 204 calories
